member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseCommand.ExecuteTable``1
member.summary: Execute the query and return an array of new instances of typed results filled with data table result.

example.code: Employee[] emp = cmd.ExecuteTable<Employee>(); var x = cmd.ExecuteTable<Employee>();
example.remarks: Result object property (ex. Employee.Name) may be tagged with the ColumnAttribute to set which column name (ex. [Column("Name")] must be associated to this property.

member.summary: Retry a query when a SqlException occured (ex. DeadLock exception).

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.#ctor(Apps72.Dev.Data.IDatabaseCommand)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of DatabaseRetryExceptions

member.name: P:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.NumberOfRetriesBeforeFailed
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of retries to execute before the process failed.

member.name: P:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.MillisecondsBetweenTwoRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait before a new command will be executed.

member.name: P:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.CriteriaToRetry
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of methods executed to check the error codes and to retry.

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.SetDefaultCriteriaToRetry(Apps72.Dev.Data.RetryDefaultCriteria)
member.summary: Sets the default ErrorCodesToRetry list with DeadLock codes (1205).

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.Activate(System.Action{Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry})
member.summary: Activate the retry process, defining ExceptionsToRetry criterias. Ex. ExceptionsToRetry = (ex) => { return ex.Message.Contains("deadlock"); };

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.IsExceptionToRetry(System.Data.Common.DbException)
member.summary: Returns True if the specified DbException is known by the ErrorCodesToRetry list

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.IsNotAnExceptionToRetry(System.Data.Common.DbException)
member.summary: Returns True if the specified DbException is unknown by the ErrorCodesToRetry list

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.WaitBeforeRetry
member.summary: Increment the Retry Counter, And wait some milliseconds before to continue. Returns False if the counter is greater than NumberOfRetriesBeforeFailed value.

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.ResetRetryCounter
member.summary: Reset the Retry Counter to zero.

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry.ExecuteCommandOrRetryIfErrorOccured``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Execute the specified method (ExecuteTable, ExecuteNonQuery or ExecuteScalar) And retry x times if asked by RetryIfExceptionsOccured property.

member.name: T:Apps72.Dev.Data.RetryDefaultCriteria
member.summary: List of default definitions for

member.name: F:Apps72.Dev.Data.RetryDefaultCriteria.SqlServer_DeadLock
member.summary: Deadlock in SQL Server (Message contains "deadlock").

member.name: F:Apps72.Dev.Data.RetryDefaultCriteria.OracleServer_DeadLock
member.summary: Existing state of package in Oracle Server (Message contains "ORA-04068" or "ORA-04061").

member.name: M:Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetryExtensions.IsActivated(Apps72.Dev.Data.DatabaseRetry)
member.summary: Returns True if a check criteria is defined.

member.summary: Execute the query and return an array of new instances of typed results filled with data table result.
